hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Mas`ud Al-Ansari:Whenever Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) (p.b.u.h) ordered us to give in charity, we used to go to the market and work as porters and get a Mudd (a special measure of grain) and then give it in charity. (Those were the days of poverty) and today some of us have one hundred thousand

chapter.ara-name: باب اتَّقُوا النَّارَ وَلَوْ بِشِقِّ تَمْرَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: "Protect yourself from Hell-fire even with half a date"
